text: Pseudalbara fuscifascia is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Watson in 1968. It is found in China (Zhejiang, Sichuan).Collections of the Lepidoptera Section The length of the forewings is 13–14 mm for males and 15-16.5 mm for females.Bull. Br. Mus. nat. Hist. (Ent.) Suppl. 12 : 67 ==References== Category:Moths described in 1968 Category:Drepaninae Category:Moths of China
title: Pseudalbara fuscifascia
